title: Surge In Tax Fraud Prompts Discussion Of Prevention Measures
teaser: After a spate of fraudulent tax returns, the IRS announced it would work with state tax authorities and online tax filing companies to reduce fraud.
contentencoded:
Tax season has arrived and so have some headaches, especially for people who use the do-it-yourself online filing service Turbo Tax.

The company is dealing with a surge in fraudulent filings, and last week the IRS announced it would work with state tax authorities and private companies, like Turbo Tax, to reduce fraud.

Guest

  • Jonnelle Marte, personal finance reporter for the Washington Post. She tweetsÂ @Jonnelle.
